segments.text: Hello , Steven . How do you get along with your job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Actually , I learn many things from it . I find that I am a quick learner in new things .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Practice makes perfect . By the way , what do you learn from your job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: At first I didn't know anything about the machine . Now I know how to operate it . Besides , the work gives me a sense of fulfillment and achievement .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , you are a good learner . I must commend you for your good performance .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . That's a long way to go for my job .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I appreciate your effort very much . The coffee break is over ; it's about time we set to work .
segments.speaker: S1
